categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks
Category:Hyperspace: The Official Star Wars Fan Club

nodes.text: "Fists of Ion" is a Hyperspace-exclusive short story written by Edward M. Erdelac and illustrated by Cat Staggs. The story was published on StarWars.com on October 31, 2008. On October 1, 2012, it was republished on Suvudu, a subsidiary website of Random House publishing.
"Fists of Ion" is told as an excerpt from Chapter 7: Hard Raine of the in-universe novel Fists Of Ion: Memoirs Of A Champion Shockboxer. The excerpt was published in Transgalactic Perspectus 41:4:34.
